description.value: Your dedication to @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.The Godclaw]{The Godclaw} borders on a cleric's. You gain the cleric's @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Domain Initiate]{Domain Initiate} feat but must select perfection, protection, tyranny, or zeal as your domain. In addition, you can use any religious symbol of @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Abadar]{Abadar}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Asmodeus]{Asmodeus}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Iomedae]{Iomedae}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Irori]{Irori}, or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Torag]{Torag} as your divine focus.
